text: Pulau Tekong, also known colloquially as Tekong, is the second-largest of Singapore's outlying islands. It is off Singapore's northeastern coast, east of Pulau Ubin. The island is used by the Singaporean military and is not open to the general public. Transport to the island for permitted persons is via SAF Changi Ferry Terminal. Category:Geography of Singapore Category:Islands of Asia
title: Pulau Tekong
